entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
